nodes.text: The Nemesis-class patrol ship was a patrol ship manufactured by Corellian Engineering Corporation.

The Nemesis-class had advanced sensors and computers, was durable, yet light, and had enough storage space for troops or speeder bikes to be deployed from the craft. The fire-linked guns could be independently operated by dedicated gunners if the ship had a full crew.

Created before the Sith–Imperial War, the Nemesis-class was marketed toward smaller worlds and governments in the Outer Rim. In addition to serving local administrations and law enforcement agencies, many Nemesis-class ships ended up in the hands of Black Sun, where they were used in operations in the distant and isolated regions of the galaxy.
Black Sun employed a Nemesis-class patrol ship during the Skirmish on Iego.
